mapper.sql: id, mk_id, create_month, is_calculated, cre_time, mod_time
mapper.update:
update bill_customer_master
is_calculated = #{isCalculated,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mod_time = #{modTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select b.mk_id as mkId,c.mk_invoice_name as mkInvoiceName, a.cre_month as createMonth, SUM(a.total_amount) as prepareAmount from bms_asyn_calcu_task a LEFT JOIN pub_customer b on a.customer_id = b.customer_id and b.del_flag='0' LEFT JOIN pub_customer_base c on b.mk_id=c.mk_id and c.del_flag='0' WHERE b.mk_id=#{mkId} and a.cre_month=#{creMonth} GROUP BY b.mk_id,a.cre_month
mapper.insert:
insert into bill_customer_master(mk_id, create_month, is_calculated, cre_time) values
( #{item.mkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createMonth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.isCalculated,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.creTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE mod_time = VALUES(mod_time), is_calculated = VALUES(is_calculated)
